articles.author: Annette Weisbach
articles.title: European Central Bank set to cut rates for the first time since 2019 - CNBC
articles.description: It will mark the official end to the record fast-hiking cycle that begun after the Covid-19 pandemic as inflation soared higher.
articles.content: President of the European Central Bank (ECB) Christine Lagarde arrives to address a press conference following the meeting of the governing council of the ECB in Frankfurt am Main, western Germany, o… [+2562 chars]
